name: Octovox
0:
”Alexa, open my three d. print server.”
”ask my three d. print server what is printing”
”ask my three d. print server how much time is left”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my three d. print server
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Octovox Skill is used in combination with the Octovox Plugin for your OctoPrint server. The Octovox plugin on your OctoPrint server will periodically publish status updates about your printer to the Octovox service. After linking your account, you will be able to request detailed information about your printer such as Printer Status, Hot End Temperature, Bed Temperature, current print job status and previous print job results.

The architecture of this skill/plugin combo ensures that you never have to expose your OctoPrint server to the public internet, and you will never have to provide any secure information about your server like username, password, or API Keys.

*This skill has no official affiliation with OctoPrint, for information about OctoPrint visit: https://octoprint.org/

Please visit the Github page for this skill at https://github.com/johnnyruz/OctoPrint-Octovox if you have any issues with this skill or setup!
